comment: Could you please specify a bit more in details what is too slow, I might then even be able to fix it?

title: Sorry
comment: I have no words but 1 star and sorry

I'm so sorry you didn't like it, but I'm even more sorry that you didn't tell why, because I won't be able to fix it for you, and it won't help others to decide if they should install or not.
If you change your opinion and find some words, you may enhance your comment or describe your issue(s) at https://code.google.com/p/pmtd/issues.
